description.value:
You add two new wizard encounter attack powers to your spellbook. The powers must be of 3rd level or lower, and the two function as daily attack powers for you.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.0KOigXbesEdRYqtS]{Blissful Ignorance}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.IgQx6j17JnYGa9O8]{Color Spray}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.d9e0pcYIx2RJTQuG]{Shock Sphere}
